alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bertie, southeastern Northampton and southwestern Hertford Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rich Square, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rich Square around 515 PM EDT. Woodland around 520 PM EDT. Roxobel around 525 PM EDT. Aulander around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eagletown, Kelford, Saint John, Connaritsa, Millennium, Burden and Bryantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina.
